parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (13240044) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for tracking and reporting campaign spending.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Dragoș-Gabriel Zisopol, a candidate for the Uniunea Elenă din România party, participating in the parliamentary elections.  His name, party affiliation, and position on the ballot are clearly stated. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform.  The content and targeting (Sibiu, Romania, age 18-65, all genders) indicate an attempt to reach a wide audience, not just personal communication. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters in Sibiu to vote for Dragoș-Gabriel Zisopol. The call to action ("vâ invit să votați candidatul Uniunii Elene din România") explicitly aims to influence the election outcome. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific candidate and party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clearly structured campaign advertisement promoting a candidate and party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>919000556854153</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, Art 36 (7). It refers to a specific candidate (Dragoș-Gabriel Zisopol), uses campaign materials (image and text), targets a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support the candidate. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's content, targeting, and call to action all point towards an intention to influence the election.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>DRAGOŞ-GABRIEL ZISOPOL</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Uniunea Elenă din România</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Uniunea Elenă din România, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame electorale plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 (ID postare: 919000556854153), care promovează candidatul Dragoș-Gabriel Zisopol pentru Camera Deputaților, cu un efect electoral clar pozitiv, prin îndemnul explicit la vot ("vâ invit să votați candidatul Uniunii Elene din România") și prezentarea acestuia ca o soluție de încredere și stabilitate.  Reclama, care a avut o estimare a acoperirii de 100.000 - 500.000 de persoane,  conține un număr CMF (13240044), indicând o cheltuială electorală, și se adresează publicului larg din Sibiu, cu o cheltuială sub 100 RON, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Contact: electorale@uniunea-elena.ro, +40760673009.  Această acțiune constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
